Text:
If you are looking for a clean one don't waste your time with this. This is another hardcoded english subtitle version.
so the info "SUBTiTLES.......: N/A " is not correct
thanks for this info... too bad.
There is no other version yet...

FYI: English subs are hardcoded on the actual blu-ray.

http://forum.blu-ray.com/blu-ray-movies-north-america/173095-biutiful-javier-bardem-may-31st-2.html

@ AlfNader 
For fucks sake your forcing me to rant in every turn. Let me widen your understanding of the universe: There are blurays published for countries outside of America. Yes, a disturbing and mind-boggling notion but I'm confident with time you'll grasp the meaning of it.
